ygData.subject: Re: The Light of the Flame!
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson Prime swallows hard, knowing that he had to leave Rodimus behind.  He could hardly answer Legacy, but does his best to keep his composure while quickly

Tucson Prime swallows hard, knowing that he had to leave Rodimus behind.  H=
e could hardly answer Legacy, but does his best to keep his composure while=
 quickly approaching the main entrance to the fortress, as it was cleared b=
y Legacy.  He was hurting inside, and it was clear by his moment of silence=
 that he was deeply saddened by leaving Rodimus Prime behind.  Yet he compo=
ses a reply.

"This- is Tucson Prime..  Rodimus - Rodimus is still inside t=
he tunnel system.  He - told me to go without him..."

His emotions were in=
terrupting his train of thought.  Badly heart broken, he knew he just could=
n't up and leave Rodimus as he had instructed.  No, it wasn't like Tucson t=
o fail on a comrade twice in a row.  First he had a responsibility to get e=
veryone out safely.  He speeds up at the foot of the entrance, stops short =
as he gets there, and opens the doors to all his cabs.  And abruptly breaks=
 off contact with Legacy.

"Night Shift, take Perceptor and Windlord out of=
 my cab and get them to Legacy!  NOW!"

Night Shift gasps.

"Umm, come agai=
n?  You're - not gon' back there are ya?!"

Tucson Prime swings his back ca=
b toward the outside area.

"GO NOW!  DO AS YOUR TOLD!"

Night Shift rolls =
off with Perceptor and Windlord in towe and soon catches up to Legacy and t=
he others.  

"Oh Primus no, we don't need ta lose both our Primes, not now=
! "

Night Shift turns swiftly to face his leader, who is preparing to go b=
ack in.

"WAIT YA DON'T HAVE YOUR TRANSMITTER!  YOU'LL GET LOST IN THERE WI=
THOUT IT!"

Tucson replies back.

" I've mapped the course using a thermal =
GPS system. I'll be fine!  DON'T WAIT FOR ME! GO!"

Night Shift turns back =
around and follows Legacy.  His pulsation system was now going a mile a min=
ute.  

" Slag, why does he always have ta pull stunts like this?!  It's li=
ke Kup said, Wrecklessness with finesse!"

Tucson wastes no time in barrell=
ing back in the way he had come out.  He blows his horn to let Rodimus know=
 that he was about to attempt a retrieval in the throws of risking his own =
demise!

" I know you told me to get out but to me, that is completely out =
of the question!  No Autobot leaves his comrades alone!  No matter what sta=
te they are in! I will NOT abandon you Rodimus, I can't abandon you!"

Outs=
ide with Legacy, Rat Trap is now open to Tucson Prime's signature and his e=
xpressions turn completely grim.  In his tiny little roden eyes, tears well=
 up.  He knew that the situation was grave, and fears the worst for his new=
ly found friend.

"Wheels!  Lord Elder, This is Rat Trap, Wheels was commn'=
 out with the others, but Rodimus told 'em ta go, he did, but he just turne=
d around and now he's gon' back in for Rodimus!  I dunno if he's gonna be a=
ble ta come out in one piece!"

Quickstride thinks for just a moment.

"Dep=
thcharge...  I bet he can help us!  " This is Quickstride ta Depthcharge ov=
er! Tucson Prime's attempting a last minute rescue, and situation is grave!=
  Need assistance ASAP!"

Inside, Tucson's many wheels turn rapidly as he t=
ries to reach Rodimus.  Because of his failure two years past, he tries to =
redeem himself by actually succeeding in bringing out his comrade alive.  H=
e knew the attempt could endanger his life as well, but by Primus he had to=
 try.  He sounds his horn three more times, hoping that Rodimus would hear =
him.

ote:

> Who: LEGACY, DEEPSTRYKE, PHOBIA, Rat Trap, Quickstride,
> Location=
: Outside the Black Fortress
>

> > Quickstride knew when to turn tail, =
and this time, he does just as his gut feelings tell him to do. Turn around=
 and bolt as fast as his hooves could take him.
> >
> > "On second thought =
Legacy's right! I'M OUTA HERE!"
> 
> Legacy slowed slightly as he Quickstri=
de catch up, and then continued
> on his way towards the exit, his cannon b=
lasting open any doors that
> stood in their way. It was only a mater of mi=
nutes before they got to
> the main door, it already being open from when t=
hey first entered.
> 
> Legacy drove across the fallen door that bridged th=
e lava like a draw
> bridge and then finally began to slow.
> 
> "Tuscon, R=
odimus" Legacy transmitted to the two Primes, "Myself, Rat
> Trap and Quick=
stride have successfully escaped the Black Fortress,
> where are you locate=
d?"
